text:
At night, try to get 
comfortable.
 
Get some sleep if possible. 
A warm bath or shower may 
help you to relax. During the 
day, keep upright and remain 
active. This helps the baby to 
move down into the pelvis and 
helps the cervix to dilate.
Once labour is established, 
the midwife will check from 
time to time to see how you 
are	progressing.	In	a	first	
labour, the time from the start 
of established labour to full 
dilation can be between 6 and 
12 hours. It is often quicker in 
subsequent
